a.detail: An iron chandelier hangs from the ceiling here

c.detail: Several corpses are impaled upon iron spikes on the ceiling

i.detail:

u.detail: A chute descends from the corridor into a plundered tomb below

v.detail: A narrow shaft descends from the corridor into the next dungeon level down

details.history: The dungeon was created by a cult of elemental air as a stronghold. Its creators were destroyed by a terrible discovery, and the dungeon has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Shadowy (phosphorescent fungus or candles every 20 ft.)

wandering_monsters.1: Goblin Boss (cr 1, mm 166) and 1 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); medium, 250 xp, trying to lure the party into an ambush
wandering_monsters.2: Mimic (cr 2, mm 220); deadly, 450 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.3: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, actively patrolling their territory
wandering_monsters.4: Bandit Captain (cr 2, mm 344) and 1 x Bandit (cr 1/8, mm 343); deadly, 475 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.5: Gelatinous Cube (cr 2, mm 242); deadly, 450 xp, scavenging for food and treasure
wandering_monsters.6: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); easy, 100 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
